title: Falling In Love With The Grim Reaper - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Love   Curses   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Interdimensional Travel   Seme Protagonist   Time Travel
author: Wei Feng Ji Xu   微风几许
description:
Chi Jiayan, a 'heavenly fiend lonely star'[1], had met the Grim Reaper when he was very young.

At that time he was crying in an embarrassing situation, as he looked so adorable, the Grim Reaper, without a hitch… bought him an ice cream.

Later, Chi Jiayan became an adult and his birthday wish was—to be the bridegroom of the god of death??

Grim Reaper: I refuse.

Chi Jiayan: What, refuse? Then I will reluctantly become your bride. (^-^)

Grim Reaper: …

This is a story about a human courting the Grim Reaper and taming him.

Grim Reaper: This human being might be poisonous.

Note:
[1]heavenly fiend lonely star- idiom which means bane of others’ existence (also translated as ‘an orphan who causes others misery’)>
